Helens

Helens is a shoegaze band from Portland, Oregon.

Origin Portland, Oregon, USA
Genres
  • Shoegaze
Years active 2014-present
Links
  • https://spotify.link/6VEhq5Hc0Db

Over several EPs, Helens has cultivated a distinctive brand of dreamy shoegaze that draws its inspiration from '90s artists like Slowdive as well as dream pop. Helens' two vocalists sing in a detached, distant manner, while the instruments in the band produce a loud, distorted, often static mass of sound.

Releases

  • Flora
  • Pollen
  • Somewhere in Nowhere
  • Teeth
